title: Settling the Affairs of an Atrocious Noble - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Depictions of Cruelty   Enemies Become Lovers   Handsome Male Lead   Knights   Master-Servant Relationship   Nobles   Possessive Characters   R-18   Reincarnated in Another World   Royalty   Ruthless Protagonist   Second Chance   Strong Love Interests   Stubborn Protagonist   Suicides   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: 栢本みおり
description:
Location, time, and situation. Everything was put into place, and he pulled off a perfect (suicide made to look like an) 'accident'!

…or so he thought. He found himself reincarnated as the villainous Duke Heinreid from his favorite book, “Sieg of the Rebellion”. Remembering the atrocious deeds of his heartless “self”, Heinreid resolved to die in accordance with the plot of the story. However, Craig, an escort knight who was secretly betraying the duke, had become suspicious of him—?!>
